title: Hand of Fate (Eclipse)
description:
The ECUP drops trou and streaks across campus with 'Hand of Fate'!

Per the Grand Comic Database, Hand of Fate is "the adventures of Artemus Fate, a psychic in the Sam Spade tradition." The three-issue mini-series was published by Eclipse in early 1988, written by Bruce Jones and illustrated by Gerald Forton. The first two issues were in color, while the third one had black and white interiors (a not-uncommon occurrence with Eclipse, who used this tactic to keep low-selling books alive a bit longer -- see the later issues of 'Crossfire' as an example).

All three issues are found within. Props to the creative team and the scanners! Obtain it, bestow it!

***PERSONAL NOTE***

Jesus *^#@!)&' Christ, the ECUP is taking up a lot of time!!

Therefore, in order to speed things up a bit AND to ease my burden, most of the remaining torrent descriptions will also contain a link to a fine Eclipse series that has ALREADY been uploaded by someone else but might be a little dated and/or under-seeded. After pointing you to said series, I will then seed it for (at least) 24 hours so that all of Santa's good little boys/girls/transgenders can nab the download. Once you have it, please PLEASE continue to seed it for a few days, just as you have been doing with my new uploads. Comprende vous?

Alrighty then. 'World of Wood', a five-issue mini that collected work by Wally Wood, is our first entry. It was uploaded by fudoh101 a few months back and you can find it here:
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8644334/Wallace_Wood__World_of_Wood_(Eclipse)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8644334/Wallace_Wood__World_of_Wood_(Eclipse)</a>

Get dat sumbitch, share dat sumbitch!
